data.name: The Cycle: Frontier - Elite Pack
data.detailed_description:
The best Prospectors always come prepared, and with this ultimate Starter Pack you'll be sure to thrive! You get four unique outfits, unique weapon skins, plus a mountain of Aurum and gear!
Your Aurum balance and Cosmetic items are not affected by seasonal wipes, and any K-Marks and Gear from the packs will be regranted each season!

  • 3000 Aurum
  • 150000 Kmarks
  • 2x S-576 PDW
  • 2x C-32 Bolt Action
  • 2x Scarab
  • 2x Km-9 'Scrapper'
  • 2x Manticore
  • 2x Helmet (Rare)
  • 2x Shield (Rare)
  • 2x Medium Backpack
  • 2x Large Backpack
  • 2x Heavy Duty Backpack
  • Elite Manticore
  • Elite Axe
  • Elite Wrangler Basesuit
  • Elite Wrangler Vest
  • Elite Wrangler Boots
  • Elite Wrangler Gloves
  • Elite Storm Runner Basesuit
  • Elite Storm Runner Chestpiece
  • Elite Storm Runner Boots
  • Elite Storm Runner Gloves
  • Elite Survivalist Basesuit
  • Elite Survivalist Chestpiece
  • Elite Survivalist Boots
  • Elite Survivalist Gloves
  • Elite Enforcer Basesuit
  • Elite Enforcer Jacket
  • Elite Enforcer Boots
  • Elite Enforcer Gloves
  • Elite Jumpsuit

data.short_description: The best Prospectors always come prepared, and with this ultimate Starter Pack you'll be sure to thrive! You get four unique outfits, unique weapon skins, plus a mountain of Aurum and gear!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Italian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 2GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 4GB VRAM
